leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 核科学与核聚变计算生态
leaf_cluster.typical_objects: 等离子体场, 粒子分布, 磁约束几何, 诊断信号, 输运方程
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 建模→仿真→诊断/反演→控制/优化→验证→工作流
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 大型仿真器 + 诊断/反演工具 + 控制/优化 + HPC

unit.unit_name: 工作流/HPC/可复现执行与数据管理
unit.coverage_tools: workflow、容器、作业调度、数据格式与归档

tools.name: IPS-framework
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for coupled HPC simulations in plasma physics
tools.detailed_description: The Integrated Plasma Simulator (IPS) framework provides a Python-based environment for loosely coupled component-based HPC simulations, designed for magnetic fusion energy research. It facilitates the orchestration of complex multiphysics workflows on supercomputing resources.

tools.name: METIS
tools.one_line_profile: Fast plasma scenario simulator for magnetic fusion devices
tools.detailed_description: METIS is a fast integrated modeling code developed by IRFM for simulating the time evolution of plasma scenarios in tokamaks. It models heat and current transport, equilibrium evolution, and sources, enabling rapid scenario design and analysis.

tools.name: MDSplus Docker
tools.one_line_profile: Containerized deployment for the MDSplus data acquisition system
tools.detailed_description: Docker build files and configurations for deploying MDSplus, the standard data acquisition and management system used in magnetic fusion energy research.

tools.name: MDSplus
tools.one_line_profile: Standard data management system for magnetic fusion energy research
tools.detailed_description: A set of software tools for data acquisition, storage, and management of complex scientific data, serving as the de facto standard in the fusion research community (e.g., for Tokamaks).

tools.name: mdsthin
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight Python client for MDSplus data access
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the MDSplus thin client protocol, enabling remote data access to MDSplus servers without requiring a full local MDSplus installation.

tools.name: PlasmaControl Data Fetching
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for fetching and plotting fusion control experiment data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts utilizing toksearch and OMFIT frameworks to retrieve, process, and visualize data from plasma control experiments in fusion devices.

tools.name: ATMI
tools.one_line_profile: Asynchronous Task and Memory Interface for HPC
tools.detailed_description: A runtime framework and programming model for heterogeneous CPU-GPU systems, facilitating high-performance computing tasks often used in scientific simulations.

tools.name: ModelingToolkit.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Symbolic-numeric modeling framework for scientific machine learning
tools.detailed_description: An acausal modeling framework in Julia for automatically parallelized scientific machine learning (SciML), providing a computer algebra system for integrated symbolics and differential equation transformations.

tools.name: ToFu
tools.one_line_profile: Tomography for Fusion library
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python library for synthetic diagnostics, tomography, and geometry modeling specifically for Fusion devices (Tokamaks).

tools.name: PIC-skeleton-codes
tools.one_line_profile: Particle-In-Cell Plasma Simulation codebase
tools.detailed_description: A fully-functional Particle-In-Cell (PIC) plasma simulation codebase implementing core algorithms with parallel implementations (MPI, OpenMP, CUDA) for educational and research extensibility.

tools.name: phangs_imaging_scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Imaging and data product creation workflow for the PHANGS-ALMA survey
tools.detailed_description: A collection of CASA and Python scripts designed for the calibration, imaging, and post-processing of ALMA interferometric data as part of the PHANGS survey pipeline.

tools.name: PhaseForge
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput alloy phase diagram prediction framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework for high-throughput alloy phase diagram prediction that integrates machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) with ATAT and CALPHAD modeling, supporting structure relaxation and molecular dynamics.

tools.name: duqtools
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic uncertainty quantification for Tokamak reactor simulations
tools.detailed_description: A tool for dynamic uncertainty quantification in Tokamak reactor simulations, facilitating the management of simulation runs, data formatting, and uncertainty analysis within fusion research workflows.

tools.name: ALminer
tools.one_line_profile: ALMA archive mining and visualization toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed for mining and visualizing data from the ALMA (Atacama Large Millimeter/submillimeter Array) archive, facilitating astronomical data analysis.

tools.name: StorageVET
tools.one_line_profile: Valuation model for energy storage technologies
tools.detailed_description: A valuation model for analysis of energy storage technologies and other energy resources paired with storage, enabling technical and economic viability analysis.

tools.name: eqasim-java
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated transport simulation environment based on MATSim
tools.detailed_description: An integrated transport simulation environment based on the agent-based transport simulation framework MATSim, with added components for discrete choice models.

tools.name: fusion_neutronics_workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Automated fusion specific neutronics workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool that combines open source packages to produce an automated, reproducible workflow specifically for fusion neutronics analysis.

tools.name: neutronics_material_maker
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for making reproducible materials for neutronics codes
tools.detailed_description: A software tool designed to create reproducible material definitions and standardize their usage across various neutronics simulation codes.

tools.name: ReproduceMeGit
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for analyzing reproducibility of Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool designed to analyze and enhance the reproducibility of scientific experiments conducted in Jupyter Notebooks, tracking provenance and execution.

tools.name: OMAS
tools.one_line_profile: Ordered Multidimensional Array Structure for Fusion data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to interface with the ITER Integrated Modeling and Analysis Suite (IMAS) data structure, facilitating data storage, transfer, and compatibility between fusion codes.

tools.name: ANEMOS
tools.one_line_profile: Framework modeling Compute-near-Memory cores integrated in DRAM
tools.detailed_description: A simulation framework for modeling Compute-near-Memory (CnM) architectures, specifically cores integrated within DRAM, for computer architecture research.

tools.name: runko
tools.one_line_profile: Modern C++/python CPU/GPU plasma toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A modern, high-performance toolbox for plasma physics simulations, supporting both CPU and GPU execution, designed for astrophysical and laboratory plasma modeling.

tools.name: Almanac
tools.one_line_profile: Retrieval-Augmented Language Models for Clinical Medicine
tools.detailed_description: A framework utilizing retrieval-augmented language models specifically tailored for clinical medicine contexts to improve information retrieval and decision support.

tools.name: IntegratedGradients
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Integrated Gradients for Keras models
tools.detailed_description: A Python/Keras implementation of the Integrated Gradients technique for axiomatic attribution, used to explain predictions of deep learning models in scientific research.

tools.name: FORCE
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for Optimization of Resources, Controls, and Economics
tools.detailed_description: A collection of software tools and models for analyzing the technical and economic viability of Integrated Energy Systems (IES), including optimization and control.

tools.name: ibis.iSDM
tools.one_line_profile: Modelling framework for creating Integrated SDMs
tools.detailed_description: An R-based modelling framework for creating Integrated Species Distribution Models (iSDM), facilitating ecological research and biodiversity analysis.

tools.name: IMAS-Core
tools.one_line_profile: Core access layer library for the Integrated Modelling and Analysis Suite (IMAS) in nuclear fusion
tools.detailed_description: The IMAS Access Layer core library provides the fundamental C++ interfaces and mechanisms for accessing and manipulating fusion data within the ITER Integrated Modelling and Analysis Suite. It serves as the backbone for data exchange between different physics modules and the data dictionary.

tools.name: IMAS-Data-Dictionary
tools.one_line_profile: Data model definitions and generation tools for ITER fusion experiments
tools.detailed_description: Contains the Generic Data Model (GDM) definitions for experimental and simulation fusion data used in the IMAS ecosystem. It includes XSLT scripts and schemas to generate language-specific bindings and data structures, ensuring consistency across the fusion simulation workflow.

tools.name: IMAS-ParaView
tools.one_line_profile: ParaView plugins for visualizing IMAS fusion data structures
tools.detailed_description: A set of plugins for ParaView designed to visualize General Grid Descriptions (GGDs) and other data structures defined in the IMAS data model. It enables researchers to perform 3D visualization of plasma profiles, magnetic configurations, and device geometry directly from IMAS databases.

tools.name: IMAS-Python
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for the ITER Integrated Modelling and Analysis Suite
tools.detailed_description: Provides Python bindings and high-level APIs for accessing the IMAS Data Model. It allows physicists and engineers to write data analysis scripts, simulation workflows, and pre/post-processing routines in Python while interacting with the standardized fusion data storage.

tools.name: Waveform-Editor
tools.one_line_profile: GUI tool for designing and managing fusion experiment pulse waveforms
tools.detailed_description: A graphical tool used to create, edit, and manage time-dependent waveforms for preparing fusion pulses. It helps operators and physicists define control parameters and reference signals for plasma discharges within the ITER operational workflow.

tools.name: gpuvmem
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated framework for radio astronomical image synthesis
tools.detailed_description: A CUDA-based framework designed for radio astronomical image synthesis, leveraging GPU acceleration to handle the computational demands of processing radio telescope data.

tools.name: Mimi.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated Assessment Modeling (IAM) framework
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package that provides a component-based framework for constructing and running Integrated Assessment Models (IAMs), commonly used in climate change economics and policy analysis.

tools.name: muphy2
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel multi-physics simulation code
tools.detailed_description: A multi-physics simulation framework, likely combining Molecular Dynamics (MD) and Lattice Boltzmann (LB) methods for complex fluid and particle systems.

tools.name: openreactor
tools.one_line_profile: Control and data logging system for IEC nuclear fusion reactors
tools.detailed_description: An open-source system for control, monitoring, and data logging specifically designed for Inertial Electrostatic Confinement (IEC) nuclear fusion reactors.

tools.name: nf-core/rnafusion
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq analysis pipeline for gene fusion detection
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline built using Nextflow for the detection of gene fusions from RNA-seq data, part of the nf-core community.

tools.name: GLOFRIM
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for integrated hydrological-hydrodynamic modelling
tools.detailed_description: A globally applicable framework designed to couple hydrological and hydrodynamic models for integrated water systems analysis.

tools.name: inseeds
tools.one_line_profile: Model of integrated social-ecological resilient land systems
tools.detailed_description: A scientific model based on the copan:CORE framework and LPJmL for simulating integrated social-ecological land systems.

tools.name: fast_imas_IPOL
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Image Matching by Affine Simulation (IMAS) implementation
tools.detailed_description: Source code for the IPOL (Image Processing On Line) demo of the Fast Image Matching by Affine Simulation algorithm, used in computer vision and image analysis.

tools.name: OWEFE
tools.one_line_profile: Open modeling framework for Water-Energy-Food-Environment systems
tools.detailed_description: An open modeling framework designed for the integrated analysis of water, energy, food, and environment systems, facilitating nexus research.

tools.name: StellarMesh
tools.one_line_profile: Meshing library for nuclear fusion workflows
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to generate and manage meshes for nuclear fusion simulations, supporting geometry processing and integration with transport solvers.

tools.name: PROCESS
tools.one_line_profile: Fusion power plant systems code for parameter optimization
tools.detailed_description: A systems code that calculates self-consistent parameters for a fusion power plant, ensuring operating limits are met and optimizing for specified performance metrics.

tools.name: FAIR-MAST
tools.one_line_profile: Data management system for MAST Tokamak data
tools.detailed_description: A data management solution designed for the MAST (Mega Ampere Spherical Tokamak) experiment, facilitating data access, archiving, and compliance with FAIR principles.

tools.name: MFW
tools.one_line_profile: Multiscale Fusion Workflow for HPC environments
tools.detailed_description: A workflow implementation for multiscale fusion simulations, leveraging VECMA toolkit components to manage complex execution patterns on HPC resources.

tools.name: WorldDynamics.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia framework for global integrated assessment models (IAMs) and system dynamics
tools.detailed_description: An open-source framework written in Julia for developing, simulating, and analyzing Integrated Assessment Models (IAMs) such as World3. It facilitates the study of complex interactions between global socio-economic and environmental systems using differential equations.
